content:
Hi guys...

Hope that someone remembers me :-)

It's been a tough few months here and I haven't had the enthusiasm to do a great deal, just the essentials.

I hope everyone else is doing fine... and wow 2704 posts to try and catch up on lol.

so, just trying to get my groove back... and thought I'd say HI :wave:
Hi there! A week or two ago, I was wondering where you went. :smile:
Welcome back! :wave:

Ahhh, thanks.

Had a bereavement... and needed to get our company accounts finished and submitted to HMRC :-(

Then try to get my mojo back...
Condolences - and good to have you back.
Good to have you back @Steve Moorhouse :wave: ...sending mojo-acquiring vibes your way :smile:
